mapper.select: select b.* from ord_pub_sizedtl a ,ord_pub_size b where a.sizeno=b.sizeno and a.fszty='PRDSZTY' and a.fszno=#{sizegp} and a.sizety='STDSZ' and b.sizety='STDSZ' order by b.sizeso

select b.* from ord_pub_sizedtl a ,ord_pub_size b where a.sizeno=b.sizeno and NVL(b.SIZETY1,1)=1 and a.fszty='PRDSZTY' and a.fszno=#{sizegp} and a.sizety='PRDPK' and b.sizety='PRDPK' order by b.sizeso
